Title: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe
Writer: Yves Robert (screenplay), Francis Veber (screenplay), Francis Veber (dialogue)
Actors: Pierre Richard, Bernard Blier, Jean Rochefort, Mireille Darc
Plot: A hapless orchestra player becomes an unwitting pawn of rival factions within the French secret service after he is chosen as a decoy by being identified as a super secret agent.
